[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Company Engine Component Manufacturing System (CECMS) defines requirements for processing orders, tracking production, and managing final assembly.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: CECMS integrates with sales, supplier, and production databases for real-time updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: CECMS provides dashboards for order, stock, and production tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: CECMS supports factory automation systems, barcode scanners, and order processing terminals.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: CECMS connects with ERP, procurement, and supplier systems via PostgreSQL/MySQL, REST APIs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: CECMS secures data via HTTPS, OAuth 2.0, and JWT authentication.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: CECMS optimizes storage for orders and inventory.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: CECMS ensures 24/7 availability with automated monitoring and maintenance.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: CECMS is configurable for multiple factories and supply chains.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: CECMS integrates with cloud, logistics, and supplier networks.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: CECMS supports order classification, supplier coordination, inventory tracking, invoicing, and production fulfillment.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: CECMS manages orders, production tracking, inventory classification, supplier coordination, and invoicing.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: CECMS serves sales teams, production managers, and inventory personnel.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: CECMS requires internet for real-time updates, supplier coordination.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: CECMS relies on supplier networks, sales databases, and production schedules.
[SUBSEC] 1.9 Acronyms and Abbreviations: CECMS: Company Engine Component Manufacturing System

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall process customer orders, prioritizing those with 10+ past orders, applying a 20% stock increase for priority clients (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall classify parts and generate factory and stock listings (REQ-DB-001, REQ-INTF-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall track order fulfillment and invoicing, monitoring production, payments, and deliveries (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with production databases.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall connect with supplier systems to track part availability and lead times.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall generate reports in 2s during normal demand and 5s during high demand.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an order and stock tracking interface with filters, updates, and reports.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall securely store order, production, supplier, and invoicing data.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall assign unique tracking IDs.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with industry standards, ensuring encryption, audit logs, financial transaction security, and compliance with tax regulations.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall log order, invoice, supplier updates, retaining records for 12 months (REQ-DB-001).

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests for order prioritization, supplier tracking, invoicing, and assembly coordination.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User manuals, API documentation, procurement guidelines, and compliance policies.
